en.About.Title: Who Are We?
en.About.Subtext: #Pixel is a start-up founded in 2018. by young IT experts with the mission of providing the best new solutions in the area of IT. We turn Your ideas into reality in the right way at the right time. By using modern programs, innovative approach and adequate technologies, we answer on just about every need of our clients, offering them help and support through:
en.Contact.ContentTitle: Want to start a new project?
en.Contact.ContentText: If you want to make your idea into reality, fill the next form, and we will contact you as soon as possible. We look forward to our cooperation!
en.Team.Title: Meet Our Team
en.Services.Title: What we do
en.Services.DesignText: In a fast, simple and quality way, we create accesible and interactive websites in accordance with Your needs.
en.Services.IdentityText: By using modern technologies, with the cooperation and consulting, we create ideal solution which will contribute to the recognition and authenticity of Your product.
en.Services.DevelopmentText: Maintenance of internet pages, promotion and reorganization of existing ones and designing of the innovative strategies for improvement are the part of our large portfolio when it comes to web development.
en.Services.HostingText: Maintenance and setting up web pages on servers, creating an official e-mail, creating and maintaining database are just some of solutions we offer You when it comes to maintaining and upgrading Your everyday buisness.
en.Services.MarketingText: How to position your brand on market, how to maintain social media as well as which types of content and their ways of presentations are the most suitable today are just some of the questions that our team will gladly answer and offer adequate solution.
en.Services.SeoText: With the help from our modern technologies we offer You a chance to be among the first from your area of work that will answer the needs of your clients by taking the top positions at search results.
en.PageNotFound.Paragraph: oops, sorry we can't find the page!
en.PageNotFound.Small: Either something went wrong or the page doesn’t exist anymore

sr.About.Title: Ko smo mi?
sr.About.Subtext: #Pixel je start-up osnovan 2018. godine od strane mladih IT stručnjaka sa misijom da na domaćem tržištu obezbedi najbolja i najnovija rešenja u oblasti IT tehnologija. Mi pretvaramo Vaše ideje u realnost na pravi način i u pravo vreme. Koristeći najsavremenije programe, inovativan pristup i adekvatne tehnologije odgovaramo na gotovo sve potrebe svojih klijenata pružajući im pomoć i podršku kroz:
sr.Contact.ContentText: Ukoliko želite da Vašu ideju pretvorimo u realnost, popunite sledeću formu, a mi ćemo Vam se javiti u najkraćem mogućem roku. Radujemo se zajedničkoj saradnji! Radujemo se zajedničkoj saradnji!
sr.Team.Title: Upoznajte naš tim
sr.Services.Title: Čime se bavimo
sr.Services.DesignText: Na brz, jednostavan i kvalitetan način kreiramo sajtove pristupačnog i interaktivnog sadražaja u skladu sa Vašim potrebama.
sr.Services.IdentityText: Koristeći najsavremenije tehnologije, uz saradnju i konsultacije zajednički stvaramo idejno rešenje koje će doprineti prepoznatljivosti i autentičnosti Vašeg proizvoda.
sr.Services.DevelopmentText: Održavanje internet stranica, unapređenje i reorganizacija postojećih i osmišljavanje inovativnih strategija za poboljšanje deo su našeg širokog portfolija kada je u pitanju web development.
sr.Services.HostingText: Održavanje internet stranica, unapređenje i reorganizacija postojećih i osmišljavanje inovativnih strategija za poboljšanje deo su našeg širokog portfolija kada je u pitanju web development.
sr.Services.MarketingText: Održavanje internet stranica, unapređenje i reorganizacija postojećih i osmišljavanje inovativnih strategija za poboljšanje deo su našeg širokog portfolija kada je u pitanju web development.
sr.Services.SeoText: Održavanje internet stranica, unapređenje i reorganizacija postojećih i osmišljavanje inovativnih strategija za poboljšanje deo su našeg širokog portfolija kada je u pitanju web development.
sr.PageNotFound.Paragraph: Ups, Ne možemo da pronađemo stranicu
sr.PageNotFound.Small: Nešto nije u redu ili stranica više ne postoji
